content: Is there a reason why US Core Immunization search does not include a search for Patient and Code and Date?
I see Patient and Date, asking about patient, vaccineCode and Date.
Ah you mean all three together? Don't know then - I assume searching by vaccine code was judged not necessary, or not important enough to be mandated

We only provided mandatory search where we had consensus and any and all SP combos are allowed. @Emma Jones you are welcome to submit a tracker, but any new mandatory search combinations needs general consensus from the EHR community and if you could get your colleagues on board as well that would be fantastic.
